article_text:
Accepting the end

People in Maine don’t talk about how they want to die. Here’s why they should.

og.title: People in Maine don’t talk about how they want to die. Here’s why they should.

article_metadata.description: This Maine family has faced death for a long time. Here's what their story can teach everyone else.

article_summary:
Accepting the endPeople in Maine don’t talk about how they want to die.
Here’s why they should.
